mentions.context: Finally, the comparison with the experiments using DBpedia spotlight for NER confirms that the introduction of domain knowledge in the recommendation process is beneficial and helps enhance the performance of the system even when one cannot rely on a high-quality NER method.
Table IV presents the results on dataset A when named entities are extracted with DBpedia spotlight [9], [10].

In order to evaluate to what extent the performance of our proposed approach depends on the method adopted to automatically annotate the descriptions of the service requests and providers, we conducted some additional experiments in which we used DBpedia spotlight 6 for NER.
